question: A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this area of worksay when you can attend an interview
text: I am writing to you in connection with the job position published in Montreal Today. I am interested in it and I would like you to consider me as a candidate for that role.
Currently I am studying at Montreal State University learning business English. My schedule is flexible this year and I decided that it is the perfect time to gain some work experience.

Basically, I am sure that I perfectly fit this type of job. First, I am a quite communicative and open person. Second, I am studying English right now and think it would come in handy. Finally, I have some working experience, a few years ago I worked as a receptionist at a well-known IT company.
If I had a chance, I would be happy to come to an interview and talk with you in person. I am free after 2 pm every day, so please let me know if it works for you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Currently. Consider adding a comma.
